body.name: Zinus 8” Green Tea Cool Feel Memory Foam Mattress, Bed-in-a-Box with Compact WONDERBOX Packaging, CertiPUR-US(R) Certified, Twin, White
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 17 hrs 42 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: COOL AND PEACEFUL ZZZ’S – The Cool Feel Mattress features cooling gel-infused memory foam that prevents overheating throughout the night, so you can sleep at an optimal temperature free of interruptions

REVOLUTIONARY WONDERBOX PACKAGING – This mattress ships in a Zinus WONDERBOX designed 23% smaller than other mattresses in a box for easier maneuverability, less packaging waste, and reduced carbon footprint
REFRESH AND UNWIND – Green tea infused into enveloping memory foam ensures long-lasting freshness along with contouring softness
CERTIPUR-US(R) CERTIFIED – Highest quality foam is CertiPUR-US(R) certified for durability, performance, and content
Worry-free 10 year limited warranty included; twin mattress supports a maximum weight of 250 lbs, while all other sizes can support up to 500 lbs
body.description: Sleeping cooler and comfier just became a whole lot more convenient! The Cool Feel Mattress gives you not only refreshing, perfectly cool rest, but it’s also delivered to your door in a box so compact it fits on your doormat. Folded up and compressed into our innovative Zinus WONDERBOX, you’ll enjoy the convenience of a full-sized mattress in a box that’s now 23% smaller, plus the satisfaction of knowing you’re reducing your carbon footprint. This memory foam mattress is crafted with a layer of cooling gel-infused foam on top that cradles you to sleep while whisking away excess heat so you snooze at the perfect temperature. Plus, we’ve also added our signature green tea infusion that promotes long-term freshness. Reliable Zinus Base Foam(TM) on the bottom of the mattress provides additional support and stability so you can be comfortable in any position. It’s finished with a soft and breathable knitted cover to keep you calm and collected all night, every night. With better zzz’s and peace of mind all delivered in one tiny box, the Cool Feel Mattress proves that good things do come in small packages!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Healthy product with soft touch and firm support. No chemical smell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Delivered on time, no damage to complain about.
reviews.reviewText: Easy to remove from package, and place onto frame. Sleeps well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This mattress will give you a great night's sleep
reviews.reviewText: This Zinus mattress rocks! (Although maybe that's not the best description for a mattress?)It comes packaged in a surprisingly small box (but don't let the box size fool you -- it contains a full-sized mattress and so it's HEAVY). Just remove the box (I found that it's easier to remove the box from the mattress than to remove the mattress from the box) and *carefully* take the plastic liner off -- the mattress automatically starts to expand. In a few minutes, it's reached most of its final size -- full enlargement will take a few hours.I didn't notice any chemical odor, maybe because of the green tea infusion. As for the layer of "cooling gel", I've never used a foam mattress before, so I have nothing to compare it to. (Unlike some other mattresses, this mattress has a "top" and "bottom" -- don't mix them up!) But I can vouch for this mattress -- it's quite comfortable and I haven't noticed any problems with nighttime overheating whatsoever.The convenience of having a mattress delivered to my door can't be beat! Fortunately, my city provides pickup of large items (like mattresses), so getting rid of my old mattress wasn't a problem. If you don't have such a service, you need to think about how you're going to dispose of your old mattress.Of course, the comfort of a mattress is very subjective and will vary from one individual to another. I'm a 5'10" 170 lb male and I find the medium-firmness / queen size very comfortable.Convenience and comfort at a reasonable price. I'm *very* happy with this Zinus memory-foam mattress! Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just like the web pictures!
reviews.reviewText: This mattress is just like the web pictures show it once you have it unpacked and it gains its un-shrunk size back. It ships in a box that is 14 by 14 by 28 (just over 3 cubic feet) (and it is HEAVY!), and it expands to a twin size mattress of 75 by 39 by 8 (13.5 cubic feet), so an expansion to more than 4 times its shipping size. The lesson here? Once you expand it, you'll NEVER get it back in the box!Once expanded (allow about 24 hours, although it APPEARS done in just about 3 hours or so), it seems just as sturdy as any other spring-based mattress. I am still not sure if I like the memory-foam feature or not. But as a mattress in a spare room, especially with a twin mattress for kids, it appears to be okay. I am also not sure if I can tell any difference based on the COOLING gel principle. And I certainly have no CLUE what the Green Tea effect is on a mattress -- the thing is white, not green in any way!Lacking anything negative to say about this mattress, other than not being able to store it back in its box, I'm giving it 5 stars. When I lay on it, it DOES compress under my weight, but not suffocatingly so, and I am 210 pounds, and it says its weight limit is 250 pounds. So for a child's bed, especially one in our guest bedroom that will be only rarely used, it'll be a great lower-cost solution than a standard mattress of any quality (low-cost mattresses could be less costly, but I wouldn't want MY kid or grandkid to have to endure such a cheap mattress). This has higher quality without a higher price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It sunk in to the frame. It just felt like foam not any support. We are not heavy people and I can’t imagine what this really is. It feels like my foam top from Walmart. I am replacing a fantastic memory foam mattress with a size up. I went down in price and it shows.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great choice for a spare bed or lighter people
reviews.reviewText: This mattress was a pleasant surprise. It came fully compressed in a reasonably small box. It is heavy. Once unpacked the mattress began to regain its full size. It seemed to reach the full size over a few hours but I gave it a full 24 hours. I did not notice any chemical odors.I would say this mattress has a medium firmness. You do sink in a bit but also feel the support. Being an 8-inch mattress I feel this is better for occasional use or for lighter people. I don't know that it would hold its support if used every night by a heavier individual. We did add a 3-inch mattress topper to give the mattress some extra thickness and support.I am not clear on what green tea does, but I don't see how it could hurt. The addition of the gel-based foam should help the mattress dissipate heat better than just the regular foam would do. If you need a mattress for a spare bed or a child this mattress from Zinus is a solid choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cooling queen mattress
reviews.reviewText: I love this queen mattress that has real effective cooling features built within. It is the perfect level of firmness/softness and actually keeps a hot sleeper like myself cool throughout the night. This item is a great value for the money. I have already recommended this product to other family members looking for a new mattress. I highly recommend and would buy again if I needed an additional mattress!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You can't go too wrong with a Zinus!
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this full size mattress for MY guest room in my daughter's home! I've had my own Zinus king for years, though it is a 12" thick version. I don't expect an 8" mattress would work nearly as well for daily use with heavy people like us as far as longevity is concerned, but it is just as comfy as my own for more infrequent use. My husband and I are 220/155 lbs respectively, and we sleep so well on this mattress. Do make sure you give it a day or two to fully "inflate" inside and out before using it. I'm happy to share this with the other in-laws...we all FINALLY have a good mattress for when we go and stay with the kiddos!

The Zinus mattress has truly transformed my sleep experience. Its exceptional comfort and support have made each night's rest a rejuvenating experience. The plush yet supportive surface ensures a comfortable sleep, relieving pressure points and allowing me to wake up feeling refreshed and energized. The quality construction and durability make this mattress a long-term investment in quality sleep. Overall, I highly recommend the Sinus mattress for anyone seeking unparalleled comfort and a great night's sleep.

I'm thrilled my friend suggested the Green Tea cool feel memory foam mattress – it's been a true game-changer for my sleep! The quick delivery in a compressed package made setup a breeze, and the lack of any strange odors was a relief. Once unpacked, the mattress decompressed smoothly in a few hours. The texture feels fantastic, striking the right balance between plush comfort and reliable support. The mattress's memory foam conforms to my body, alleviating the back pain I've struggled with. The "cool feel" technology works wonders, as I no longer wake up feeling overheated. Overall, the Green Tea cool feel memory foam mattress has surpassed my expectations. It's transformed my sleep quality, combining convenience, comfort, and support flawlessly. If you're in search of a new mattress, I highly recommend considering this one – it's a choice that's genuinely paid off for me.

The media could not be loaded. This mattress is very soft and not medium . I think it's good for children or people who are very thin.Please note that once opened can't be returned. But the customer service helped me solve this problem because I have a special circumstance. Amazon customer service is always Amazing !
